t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I won't be defeated by this humiliating spell. Queen Marisa's hair is what makes up her character.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: The Federal Kingdom of Gensokyo will be doomed without her hair.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I would love to see her bald.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You won't rip it all out. She's the best person to lead the kingdom, even if I think my own hair is bad.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'll laugh hard if I succeed.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Getting rid of this spell won't be easy, but I will not tolerate this hairstyle anymore.

t_scene_info.speaker: Mabayu:
t_scene_info.dialogue: You're going to fail before you land an eye on her!
